# coordinate

**Instance Property**

The center point (specified as a map coordinate) of the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D { get }
```

## Discussion

Your implementation of this property must be key-value observing (KVO) compliant. For more information on how to implement support for KVO, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/KeyValueObserving/KeyValueObserving.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000177i].

## Related Documentation

- **Location and Maps Programming Guide**
